member.name: IP_ADAPTER_GATEWAY_ADDRESS
member.summary: TheIP_ADAPTER_GATEWAY_ADDRESS structure stores a single gateway address in a linked list of gateway addresses for a particular adapter.

member.name: IP_ADAPTER_GATEWAY_ADDRESS.Alignment
member.summary: Reserved. Used by the compiler to align the structure.

member.name: IP_ADAPTER_GATEWAY_ADDRESS.Length
member.summary: The length, in bytes, of this structure.

member.name: IP_ADAPTER_GATEWAY_ADDRESS.Next
member.summary: A pointer to the next gateway address structure in the list.

member.name: IP_ADAPTER_GATEWAY_ADDRESS.Address
member.summary: The IP address for this gateway entry. This member can be an IPv6 address or an IPv4 address.
